column5: Hope you all enjoy another episode of Action Angling. Bass fishing for a change!  http://video.google.ca/videoplay?docid=324...66&hl=en-CA
nice vid, those senkos are deadly!
loved it!!!! thanks for taking the time!  Cheers!
I enjoyed that Rich thanks for the vid. I kept waiting for the part with the big bass though LOL!!!!

I thoroughly enjoyed that! I think the camera work is getting to be really good! Nice and steady. You have a good blend of action and also information. It is as good as anything I've seen on the "big" shows in a long time!  Keep up the good work, and thanks for posting!
Good show, good camera work and lots of fish.
Cool video Rich       Great job  Keep them coming  Leechman
Cudos to the newest member of Action Angling for her camera work!  One of the best episodes yet rich.  Great info - nice fish - steady hands!  Cheers, UF
Very good episode - lots of good info, nice fish, good camera work.  Thanks
Great Show.  As good as anything I watched on TV this weekend.
Let me try to watch the video at work... always enjoy your "work" at work ;-)
sweet little vid, sometimes its blurry on google video though. can't really make out words. not too in focus
So thats what you sound like. Rich, let me say, you did a great,no, superb job on that vid. The first I have seen from your collection.  Great job  Thanks for taking the time.
Thats so true little lakes do have monster bass great job Rich
Great job! I really enjoyed it because I do 90% of my fishing on small lakes just like that...actually we probably fish alot of the same water. Can't wait for the next one.
